content: For example, a program may contain both a bean representing a company's employees, and another containing a list of buildings that a company occupies. A programmer writing a function called listAssetNames() wants to write a simple way of getting the field "name" from several beans that can get the field from both Employee and Building beans, and that can be easily adapted to get the same field from other types of beans that may not be written yet.
stemmed: for exampl , program may contain bean repres compani 's employe , anoth contain list build compani occupi . A programm write function call listassetnam ( ) want write simpl way get field `` name '' sever bean get field employe build bean , easili adapt get field type bean may written yet .
